organization.name: national-college-for-teaching-and-leadership
organization.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership
organization.description: Created on 1 April 2013, when the "National College  for Leadership of Schools and Children's Services" merged with the "Teaching Agency" to become the "National College for Teaching and Leadership".

result.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership System Leader Deployment Data

extras.value: Not currently published due to sensitivities for schools in receipt of support. Publishing this data would result in schools being less willing to receive support in future. Challenges in maintaining accurate data, and proposed changes in relation to frequency and scope of data collection would be relevant to any proposed publication
